body_html:
Today I found this:
8c8ac70?diff=split

from
tensorflow/tensorboard/components/vz_projector/vz-projector-data-panel.html

#demo-data-buttons-container {
display: none;
}

and
tensorflow/tensorboard/components/vz_projector/vz-projector-data-panel.ts

 if (this.projector.servingMode === 'demo') {
       (this.$$('#demo-data-buttons-container') as HTMLElement).style.display = 'block';
       // Fill out the projector config.
      ...

we can know only when the projector.servingMode is 'demo', the upload button can be displayed
but I don't know how to set the projector.servingMode into 'demo' mode

so I just modified

#demo-data-buttons-container {
display: none;
}

into

#demo-data-buttons-container {
display: block;
}

and it works!

However, can anyone tell me how to set the projector.servingMode into 'demo' mode?
